name: AWAY: The Survival Series | Gliding Prototype
detailed_description:
Glide through the forest and chase down your next meal as you enter AWAY's Gliding Prototype featuring the tiny Sugar Glider.

AWAY: The Survival Series is a high-flying adventure that brings nature documentaries to life. Playing as the Sugar Glider, the game is set in a distant future where the animal kingdom reigns supreme. From the mighty treetops to the forest floor, immerse yourself in nature as you explore a vibrant world brimming with life, but beware of the dangers that await on your adventures…

This Gliding Prototype offers a sneak peek of the Sugar Glider’s most exciting ability as you glide through dense forests and narrow canyons in search of your next meal. We've also hidden a few playable animals throughout the forest... let us know if you find any! 😉
